actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Ways and Means, Transportation and Infrastructure, House Administration, Oversight and Reform, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
